statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ 0 \\ 8 \\ -9 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ -1 \\ -5 \\ 7 \\ -8 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
